DataElement.preferredName: Lesion Description Performed Observation Outcome Data ISO21090.ANY.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A characterization of the extent of any localized or abnormal change in the structure of part of an organ or tissue. Data or information that is determined by an act of observation. EXAMPLE(S): The result of a lab test, physical finding, self-reported symptom. The adverse event term code.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Lesion Description Performed Observation Outcome Data
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A localized pathological or traumatic structural change, damage, deformity, or discontinuity of tissue, organ, or body part.:A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.:Executed and carried through to completion.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:The result of an action._A collection or single item of factual information, derived from measurement or research, from which conclusions may be drawn.
